resources.string: What sign must you perform a complete stop for?
What sign dictates a maximum travel speed?
What sign indicates you may perform a U-turn?

Welcome to Nick and Max\'s driver quiz! The object of the quiz is simple, get the highest score possible. Read the question, then select the corresponding image. If the answer is correct, you will be able to move to the next question. If the answer is wrong, you will get one last try to select your answer. All along the quiz and at the end you will be presented with your score.
Developped by Maxime Lacasse and Nicolas Mazzone. Third year computer science students at Dawson College
